entries.name: .archivara
entries.purpose: Automation/logging workspace generated by orchestration tooling.
entries.dependency_notes: Feeds agent logs and run metadata; not required by runtime code.

entries.name: .git
entries.purpose: Git metadata and history for source control operations.
entries.dependency_notes: Used by git CLI for commits, diffs, and branch state.

entries.name: TASK_researcher.md
entries.purpose: Task handoff instructions describing required research workflow.
entries.dependency_notes: Referenced by the executing research agent, no runtime dependency.

entries.name: docs
entries.purpose: Documentation artifacts for design specs, literature review, and reports.
entries.dependency_notes: Read by developers/reviewers; generated from research tasks.

entries.name: figures
entries.purpose: Directory for PNG plots generated from experiment runs.
entries.dependency_notes: Written by plotting pipeline and referenced by reports.

entries.name: main.py
entries.purpose: Entry-point placeholder for launching local experiments or demos.
entries.dependency_notes: Depends on project modules once implementation is added.

entries.name: research_rubric.json
entries.purpose: Machine-readable execution rubric tracking phase/item statuses and acceptance notes.
entries.dependency_notes: Consumed by frontend/progress tracking and updated by scripts/update_rubric.py.

entries.name: results
entries.purpose: Directory for experiment outputs and structured JSON metrics.
entries.dependency_notes: Written by experiment scripts and read by analysis/report tooling.

entries.name: scripts
entries.purpose: Utility scripts for rubric updates, experiments, and reproducible workflows.
entries.dependency_notes: Invoked from shell/CI; depends on Python stdlib and project modules.

entries.name: src
entries.purpose: Implementation source tree for the AlphaGo-style 5D chess system.
entries.dependency_notes: Imported by training, evaluation, and test scripts.

entries.name: tests
entries.purpose: Automated validation suite for core components and invariants.
entries.dependency_notes: Executed by pytest or CI to verify acceptance criteria.
